definitions.definition: The act of storing goods ; the state of being stored .
examples: There's a lot of storage in the loft.

definitions.definition: An object or place in which something is stored.
Any computer device , including such as a disk , on which data is stored for a longer term than main memory .
examples: I′d recommend backing up these files to storage before reinstalling the operating system.

definitions.definition: The price charged for storing goods.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The act of storing goods ; the state of being stored .
secondary_definitions: ( usually countable ) An object or place in which something is stored.
( usually uncountable , computer hardware ) Any computer device , including such as a disk , on which data is stored for a longer term than main memory .
( uncountable ) The price charged for storing goods.
